data.expected_result: you get an error because there is a space in the name (like it does if you try and make one via server settings)
data.short_description: text channel doesn't give error when trying to make one with a space in the name
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a server where you can create a text channel - click the + button on the main server page (NOT server settings) to make a text channel - try and make a text channel with a space in the name 'test channel'
